info.name: usage
info.value: In Basic, CLOAD then RUN. You must CLOAD and RUN "systm" first.

info.name: usage
info.value: In Basic, CLOAD then CLOAD then RUN

info.name: usage
info.value: In Basic, CLOAD then RUN. To pass, press Enter.

info.name: usage
info.value: Boot to Monitor, LOG. Esc+F5 to escape from demo. Esc to skip the intro. 1 or 2 to start. Arrows to move, F and arrow to fire.

info.name: usage
info.value: Boot to Monitor, LOG. Z=left .=right, space=fire

info.name: usage
info.value: Boot to Monitor, LOG. Numpad 5 to climb ladder. Numpad 8 to jump.
